meta.content: Anderson Community Schools serves Pre-K through12th grade students and is located in Anderson, IN.

h3.b: READY FOR YOUR CHROMEBOOK REPAIR NEEDS

div.div: The Mission of ACS is to inspire, encourage and support every student to achieve at high levels academically and socially as responsible citizens by doing whatever it takes.

article.div: See the meeting in its entirety on this YouTube video.
Check out this video from your counselors!

img.alt: Chromebook Repairs Thumbnail Image

article.div: We will continue Chromebook repairs by offering drop-off and pick-up at our administration building. Read the full article.

img.alt: Student Meals To Be Delivered Via Bus Routes, 2 days a week Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Student Meals To Be Delivered Via Bus Routes, 2 days a week

article.div: Hey! Don't just stand there, FLAG US DOWN!! ;-) Bulk student breakfast/lunch packages will be delivered on bus routes beginning April 6, ending when school resumes. Please read the linked page for a few more details. No eLearning packets will be given out on buses.

img.alt: Shortened enrollment form Thumbnail Image

article.div: We are offering a shortened enrollment form for students who need to enroll in ACSC for this CURRENT school year.

img.alt: School Food Distribution Updates Thumbnail Image

article.div: 4/1/20 Update of the following school food distributions: Valley Grove Elementary, Anderson Elementary, 10th Street Elementary, Anderson Intermediate and Highland Middle School.
